title: 7/10 top tier champions for mid lane are AP champs...
body:
Boards reaction:

"AP champions are weak"

https://i.gyazo.com/fde73e2dbb56e1608d81a7c044433cc5.png

EDIT: the only argument I can see for ap champs being weak is that Yasuo, Irelia, Zed, and Talon all have relatively high pickrates (11%, 11%, 9%, and 6% respectively), but they're the only four AD champions out of the top twenty. 

EDIT 2: 

Let me post a counter argument here. 

The jungle is primarily dominated by AD champions, right? Not exactly. 

https://i.gyazo.com/bffd3c33b98aa81c88c9c8ccf24e8da8.png

3 out of the top 4 are exclusively AP. 4 out of ten total (or just 3/10 if you don't count gragas which I personally don't because champions like him, Zac, Sejuani and Amumu are picked mainly for their CC and tank above anything else). There are only about 6 or so AP champs picked jungle in total. 

Those numbers are very comparable to the top tier AD mid champions. Why aren't people asking for AP junglers to be taken down to a lower level?

put it better than I could have TBH.

Wasn't there also a time where ADCs, like Ashe, were played specifically mid as well and that changed after people started taking mages mid and they completely shit on ADCs?

There's been all this talk of how ADCs are the only thing that's allowed bot lane but in reality, one of the standing barriers to diversity in this game is just how oppressive mages are midlane. .-. if they were less oppressive in general, ADCs could arguably go mid as well as many other champions.

> [{quoted}](name=wildfox9T,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lkLZMQ1O,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2018-10-02T23:43:46.076+0000)
>
> there can't physically be more than 4 AD mid laners in top tier because there are only 4 AD mid laners in this game
> 
> and those 4 are all in top tier

Irelia is the 6th "top tier" champion that is AD. Yasuo is 7th. Talon is 9th. They're hardly dominating mages. 

I'd argue that the reason why you don't see more AD midlaners is that more often then not - unless they're one of the select few who are designed around being played mid lane - they get destroyed by mages. 

Making sweeping complaints like "all AD itemization is way better than AP itemization because 4 AD champions are good in mid lane" is absurd.

EDIT: It's also worth pointing out that "top tier" and "viable" aren't the same thing. Sure maybe not every single AP champ in the game is a "top tier mid" but there are more than 7 viable AP mid laners.

first off i didn't express my opinion,i just explained what the guy above meant since you asked

> can you please elaborate?

if you want my opinion AP items are really weaker than the AD ones (especially if we talk about cost-efficiency) AND give less choices in your build

also most AD items have insteresting actives/passives,things that only few AP items have

but what AP don't get from their items is in their kit as utilities

>I'd argue that the reason why you don't see more AD midlaners is that more often then not - unless they're one of the select few who are designed around being played mid lane - they get destroyed by mages. 

it's because without some AP damage stacking armor on stuff like {{champion:33}} would be a free win 

APs usually have more clear wave (at least it's more safe),utilities and CC than the AD ones,and since most of the AP champions are viable only mid if you pick something else you are going for a 4/5 AD team comp which is redundant and you will lack the things i listed above

the other classes viable mid are the ones that counter mages (assassins and some divers),and especially for the first one there are only 2 AD champion designed for laning (others are junglers)

it's kinda like for ADCs and supports,they are needed but (with few exceptions) they can't be played anywhere else but bottom,would you say that marksmans are broken because they are the only class played bot?

No, 100% of the AD mids**_ that you've selectively picked_** are  viable mid. All the others have been forced out lmao

LOL
10/10 top tier champions as marksman are AD champs.{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Kai'Sa and sometimes Kog'Maw disagree.
They are marskmen with the possibility to build ap for mixed damage. I have yet to see a Brand or a syndra.
You haven't been around when picks like Swain and Heimerdinger were the meta in the bot lane?
I was and I enjoyed the meta. I was able to legit see everything bot.

Tbh, I don't understand why people want to see "legit everything bot".
No one is asking for the same for the other lanes.

People get bored of just seeing marksmen in bot lane, ok, but why try everything to shove literally every champion in existence in that role? They could simply design champions for the bot lane position which are not marksmen instead.
Like they did with other positions, for example Ivern who was designed to be an enchanter played in the jungle. Yet no one demands that Ivern should be able to be an effective top laner.

>They are marskmen with the possibility to build ap for mixed damage

That's the point.
And that's not what we want.
Most of the AP ones are AP assasins...

First off there is way less AD mid lane champ vs AP in fact I only count 4 statically relevant AD mind laners (Yasuo, Zed, Irelia, and Talon). So mid lane should have mostly AP champs in the line up. Also champs that were issues had some nerfs. Talon, Wukong, item nerfs because of how powerful they were. Now looking into top 10 most played champions in the game all regions all Elos currently is this. 

https://www.leagueofgraphs.com/champions/stats/all
1. Lee Sin Jungler
2. Thresh Support
3. Kai'Sa AD Carry
4. Yasuo Mid, Top
5. Miss Fortune AD Carry
6. Jhin  AD Carry
7. Lucian AD Carry
8. Jax Jungler, Top
9. Ezreal AD Carry
10. Vayne  AD Carry

7 out of 10 are AD for most played champs (I excluded Kai sa, Thresh, and Jax as yo are not going to see heave AD itemization on them) but 0 AP champs are in the top 10 played.

Highest Win rates all regions all ranks is https://www.leagueofgraphs.com/champions/stats/all/by-winrate
1. Sion top 53.1%
2. Miss Fortune 53.1%
3. Ahri Mid 53%
4. Nami 53%
5. Yorick Top 52.7%
6.  Brand Support/Mid 52.6
7. Garen Top 52.6
8. Malzahar Mid 52.5%
9. Nocturne Jungle 52.5%
10.  Sona Support 52.4%

Nothing particularly special here. 
OVERLOOKING the fact that there is like 3 relevant mid laners, Overall I believe that Ahri mid is the problem here.  https://www.leagueofgraphs.com/champions/stats/middle/all

Ahri Mid 11.8% Pick Rate 52.9% Win Rate
Yasuo Mid 12.5% Pick Rate 50.1% Win Rate
Zed Mid 11.8% Pick Rate 49.2% Win Rate
Talon Mid 5.0% Pick Rate 48.7% Win Rate
Irelia Mid 5.6% Pick Rate 50.1% Win Rate
11.8 + 12.5 + 11.8  + 5 + 5.6 this is 46-47% of the games have these 5 champs. Excluding Talon and Irelia 35% of games will have Ahri, Zed, or Yasuo. meaning that if Ahri is winning more games they are obviously losing more. So until Ahri is put into a good spot these champs will continue to Ahri making their win rates worse. Anyway this post is mis leading as there are not enough AD mids.
